scripts.build: if [ "$DEPLOY_TARGET" = 'storefront' ]; then npm install --prefix packages/storefront --ignore-scripts && chmod -R +x packages/storefront/node_modules/.bin/ && npm run build --prefix packages/storefront; else npm install --prefix packages/backend --omit=dev && npm run build --prefix packages/backend; fi
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$DEPLOY_TARGET" = 'backend' ]; then npm install --prefix packages/backend --omit=dev && npm run build --prefix packages/backend; fi
scripts.build:frontend: npm install --prefix packages/frontend --ignore-scripts && chmod -R +x packages/frontend/node_modules/.bin/ && npm run build --prefix packages/frontend
scripts.build:storefront: npm install --prefix packages/storefront --ignore-scripts && chmod -R +x packages/storefront/node_modules/.bin/ && npm run build --prefix packages/storefront
